name: cerb.reply.isBannedDefunct
description: Prompt for confirmation when replying to a banned or defunct recipient
script:
inputs:
  record/message:
    required@bool: yes
    record_type: message

start:
  outcome/isBanned:
    if@bool: {{inputs.message.sender_is_banned or inputs.message.sender_is_defunct}}
    then:
      await:
        form:
          title: Warning
          elements:
            say/respond:
              content@text:
                **{{inputs.message.sender__label}}** is {{inputs.message.sender_is_banned ? 'banned' : 'defunct'}}
                ========
                Are you sure you want to send this message?
            submit/prompt_menu:
              buttons:
                continue/no:
                  label: No
                  value: no
                continue/yes:
                  label: Yes
                  value: yes
                  style: secondary
      
      outcome/reject:
        if@bool: {{'no' == prompt_menu}}
        then:
          return:
            reject@bool: yes
